017package org.spongepowered.configurate;
018
019import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
020import com.google.common.primitives.Primitives;
021import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
022import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
023import org.spongepowered.configurate.loader.ConfigurationLoader;
024import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.DefaultObjectMapperFactory;
025import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapperFactory;
026import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection;
027import org.spongepowered.configurate.util.MapFactories;
028import org.spongepowered.configurate.util.MapFactory;
029
030import java.util.Objects;
031import java.util.Set;
032
033import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
034
035/**
036 * This object is a holder for general configuration options.
037 *
038 * <p>This is meant to hold options that are used in configuring how the configuration data
039 * structures are handled, rather than the serialization configuration that is located in
040 * {@link ConfigurationLoader}s.</p>
041 *
042 * <p>This class is immutable.</p>
043 */
044public class ConfigurationOptions {
045    @NonNull private final MapFactory mapFactory;
046    @Nullable private final String header;
047    @NonNull private final TypeSerializerCollection serializers;
048    @Nullable private final ImmutableSet<Class<?>> acceptedTypes;
049    @NonNull private final ObjectMapperFactory objectMapperFactory;
050    private final boolean shouldCopyDefaults;
051
052    private ConfigurationOptions(@NonNull MapFactory mapFactory, @Nullable String header, @NonNull TypeSerializerCollection serializers, @Nullable Set<Class<?>> acceptedTypes, @NonNull ObjectMapperFactory objectMapperFactory, boolean shouldCopyDefaults) {
053        this.mapFactory = mapFactory;
054        this.header = header;
055        this.serializers = serializers;
056        this.acceptedTypes = acceptedTypes == null ? null : ImmutableSet.copyOf(acceptedTypes);
057        this.objectMapperFactory = objectMapperFactory;
058        this.shouldCopyDefaults = shouldCopyDefaults;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Create a new options object with defaults set
063     *
064     * @return A new default options object
065     */
066    @NonNull
067    public static ConfigurationOptions defaults() {
068        return new ConfigurationOptions(MapFactories.insertionOrdered(), null,
069                TypeSerializerCollection.defaults(), null, DefaultObjectMapperFactory.getInstance(), false);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Gets the {@link MapFactory} specified in these options.
074     *
075     * @return The map factory
076     */
077    @NonNull
078    public MapFactory getMapFactory() {
079        return mapFactory;
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified {@link MapFactory}
084     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
085     *
086     * @param mapFactory The new factory to use to create a map
087     * @return The new options object
088     */
089    @NonNull
090    public ConfigurationOptions withMapFactory(@NonNull MapFactory mapFactory) {
091        requireNonNull(mapFactory, "mapFactory");
092        if (this.mapFactory == mapFactory) {
093            return this;
094        }
095        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Gets the header specified in these options.
100     *
101     * @return The current header. Lines are split by \n,
102     */
103    @Nullable
104    public String getHeader() {
105        return this.header;
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified header
110     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
111     *
112     * @param header The new header to use
113     * @return The new options object
114     */
115    @NonNull
116    public ConfigurationOptions withHeader(@Nullable String header) {
117        if (Objects.equals(this.header, header)) {
118            return this;
119        }
120        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Gets the {@link TypeSerializerCollection} specified in these options.
125     *
126     * @return The type serializers
127     */
128    @NonNull
129    public TypeSerializerCollection getSerializers() {
130        return this.serializers;
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified {@link TypeSerializerCollection}
135     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
136     *
137     * @param serializers The serializers to use
138     * @return The new options object
139     */
140    @NonNull
141    public ConfigurationOptions withSerializers(@NonNull TypeSerializerCollection serializers) {
142        requireNonNull(serializers, "serializers");
143        if (this.serializers == serializers) {
144            return this;
145        }
146        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Gets the {@link ObjectMapperFactory} specified in these options.
151     *
152     * @return The factory used to construct ObjectMapper instances
153     */
154    @NonNull
155    public ObjectMapperFactory getObjectMapperFactory() {
156        return this.objectMapperFactory;
157    }
158
159    /**
160     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified {@link ObjectMapperFactory}
161     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
162     *
163     * @param objectMapperFactory The factory to use to produce object mapper instances. Must not be null
164     * @return updated options object
165     */
166    @NonNull
167    public ConfigurationOptions withObjectMapperFactory(@NonNull ObjectMapperFactory objectMapperFactory) {
168        requireNonNull(objectMapperFactory, "factory");
169        if (this.objectMapperFactory == objectMapperFactory) {
170            return this;
171        }
172        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Gets whether objects of the provided type are accepted as values for nodes with this as
177     * their options object.
178     *
179     * @param type The type to check
180     * @return Whether the type is accepted
181     */
182    public boolean acceptsType(@NonNull Class<?> type) {
183        requireNonNull(type, "type");
184
185        if (this.acceptedTypes == null) {
186            return true;
187        }
188        if (this.acceptedTypes.contains(type)) {
189            return true;
190        }
191
192        if (type.isPrimitive() && this.acceptedTypes.contains(Primitives.wrap(type))) {
193            return true;
194        }
195
196        if (Primitives.isWrapperType(type) && this.acceptedTypes.contains(Primitives.unwrap(type))) {
197            return true;
198        }
199
200        for (Class<?> clazz : this.acceptedTypes) {
201            if (clazz.isAssignableFrom(type)) {
202                return true;
203            }
204        }
205
206        return false;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified accepted types
211     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
212     *
213     * <p>'Accepted types' are types which are accepted as native values for the configuration.</p>
214     *
215     * <p>Null indicates that all types are accepted.</p>
216     *
217     * @param acceptedTypes The types that will be accepted to a call to {@link ConfigurationNode#setValue(Object)}
218     * @return updated options object
219     */
220    @NonNull
221    public ConfigurationOptions withAcceptedTypes(@Nullable Set<Class<?>> acceptedTypes) {
222        if (Objects.equals(this.acceptedTypes, acceptedTypes)) {
223            return this;
224        }
225        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Gets whether or not default parameters provided to {@link ConfigurationNode} getter methods
230     * should be set to the node when used.
231     *
232     * @return Whether defaults should be copied into value
233     */
234    public boolean shouldCopyDefaults() {
235        return shouldCopyDefaults;
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Creates a new {@link ConfigurationOptions} instance, with the specified 'copy defaults' setting
240     * set, and all other settings copied from this instance.
241     *
242     * @see #shouldCopyDefaults() for information on what this method does
243     * @param shouldCopyDefaults whether to copy defaults
244     * @return updated options object
245     */
246    @NonNull
247    public ConfigurationOptions withShouldCopyDefaults(boolean shouldCopyDefaults) {
248        if (this.shouldCopyDefaults == shouldCopyDefaults) {
249            return this;
250        }
251        return new ConfigurationOptions(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
252    }
253
254    @Override
255    public boolean equals(Object o) {
256        if (this == o) return true;
257        if (!(o instanceof ConfigurationOptions)) return false;
258        ConfigurationOptions that = (ConfigurationOptions) o;
259        return Objects.equals(shouldCopyDefaults, that.shouldCopyDefaults) &&
260                Objects.equals(mapFactory, that.mapFactory) &&
261                Objects.equals(header, that.header) &&
262                Objects.equals(serializers, that.serializers) &&
263                Objects.equals(acceptedTypes, that.acceptedTypes) &&
264                Objects.equals(objectMapperFactory, that.objectMapperFactory);
265    }
266
267    @Override
268    public int hashCode() {
269        return Objects.hash(mapFactory, header, serializers, acceptedTypes, objectMapperFactory, shouldCopyDefaults);
270    }
271
272    @Override
273    public String toString() {
274        return "ConfigurationOptions{" +
275                "mapFactory=" + mapFactory +
276                ", header='" + header + '\'' +
277                ", serializers=" + serializers +
278                ", acceptedTypes=" + acceptedTypes +
279                ", objectMapperFactory=" + objectMapperFactory +
280                ", shouldCopyDefaults=" + shouldCopyDefaults +
281                '}';
282    }
283}
